title: Black susano
author: Black susano
content: I been see one post like that for Facebook about the patients dogs with the way things are in this our country9jaupload  For me ohhhh I think the patient dog don stop to dey eat the fattest bone long time ago because  if the patient dog still dey wait e be like say hungry go kill am ohhhh so e go just use shortcut get wetin him want.What do you guys think about this proverb do you think people still have this patient or they shortcut to get what they want.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 06, 2023, 07:02:07 PMWhat do you guys think about this proverb do you think people still have this patient or they shortcut to get what they want.For diz life all of us know watin we want and watin we no want, me i know believe say eh get where any sure short cut they way no go backfire the person for the end. That Proverb nah watin them use they give people way wan give up courage. eh they left 4 us to use am well or abandon am, for person to they successful for this life u need more than patient to make am, if u seat down for one place say u be patient dog, say one dey luck go run enter ur side, my broda nah big mistake u they make bcuz u fit end up to be the bone way the dog go later eat. Wen eh com for hustle and to pursue pesin dream 4 any where way u think say eh go better for u, u no just need to they patient, watin u need nah to hustle hard, hustle smart, carry anything negative way dey come for ur head keep for our side cuz eh fit be distraction to u.. then focus to they hustle that ur hustle, and then u apply patient, then u fit they rest assured say one day u go meet that dream way u they pursue. Every small step way u they take for this life they give you higher chance to actually grab watin u they fine, dan to seat down for one place.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 06, 2023, 07:02:07 PMWhat do you guys think about this proverb do you think people still have this patient or they shortcut to get what they want.Omo, dis proverb na olden days proverb o and if you wan follow am for dis current situation wey we dey for Naija, you go just kpai with hunger, thinking and frustration. Just imagine yourself for how far you don come to dis position wey you dey now, you go tell me say some situation no warrant make you dey patient? But as you see say e no fit work, you still stay back dey wait? I sure say you no wait. They get some kind level wey if you reach dat proverb go fit dey applicable to use but in most cases today, you can’t be patient enough forever when you’re almost dying. D only tin be say make person no go dey think say him dey patient meanwhile na him time e just dey waste dey go like dat.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: Black susano on August 06, 2023, 07:02:07 PMI been see one post like that for Facebook about the patients dogs with the way things are in this our country9jaupload  For me ohhhh I think the patient dog don stop to dey eat the fattest bone long time ago because  if the patient dog still dey wait e be like say hungry go kill am ohhhh so e go just use shortcut get wetin him want.What do you guys think about this proverb do you think people still have this patient or they shortcut to get what they want.This post don cast tey tey... e for make sense say e get wetin the dog dey wait for... but for as e be for the country so, the dog dey wait in vain. See a things dey mocr from bad to worse as time dey go... wetin really be the thing wey the dog dey wait for? Well, the patient dog dey wait to eat bone wey them don grind use feed their chicken. Las las na hunger go ki that patient dog.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Breaking news:  the patient's dog is dead,  and the course of the dead na because of starvation ulcer! That is the reality in our today Nigeria and my people the best possible way to survive in this country is to try and have online skills such as cryptocurrency trading,  investment in good assets like Bitcoin and also diversify your income as much as possible and be mindful of your spending. Because led for the government and the situation of things in Nigeria it is more likely that the citizens will work like elephants and eat like rats because the cost of living and the wages of the civil servant including minimum wages scant meet up wit current societal demands and that is something that is overly affecting the overall economic fortune of many Nigerians.
